title: Am I the only one who works well and focuses better when it is noisy? - Quora

response.answer_text: You might be. When I work I do not like any noise because I need to hear my equipment. Part of troubleshooting broken equipment is to listen to it. Also If someone is talking I give them my undivided attention so I have to stop working. I can either listen to what you have to say or work on the equipment but not both.
